closed_reason: Added dedicated 'Human-Only Tasks (awaiting=work)' section to tk top-level help with clear explanation and examples for creating/updating tasks with --awaiting work, how they're skipped by agent queues, and how to return them to agent queue
description: The tk top-level help mentions --manual is deprecated but doesn't explain --awaiting=work as the replacement. Add clear documentation for awaiting=work usage.
title: Document awaiting=work in tk top-level help
